review: I took chlorthalidone and amlodipine for several years for high blood pressure (HBP). The latter caused unsightly leg edema.Nine days ago the chlorthalidone was replaced by spironolactone, and potassium supplements were stopped. My BP remains OK, and since the change, the edema has decreased noticeably.
No side effects and a lot easier to my metabolism than Lasix
It has less side effects than other medications.
